DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine pharmacokinetics creatine nitrate supplementation .
DOC.detailed_description: Creatine nitrate contain several nutrient may increase anaerobic exercise performance . Theoretically , dietary supplementation creatine nitrate resistance training improve quality training lead great change strength , power fat free mass . Endothelial function measure flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) , non-invasive vascular health parameter measure via ultrasonography , predictor cardiovascular disease risk precede traditional risk marker . Diet , physical activity pharmaceutical intervention impact vascular function health . The purpose study determine acute vascular response creatine nitrate supplementation FMD analyze pharmacokinetics creatine nitrate supplementation .
DOC.criteria: apparently healthy recreationally active male age 18 40 ; history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmia and/or cardiovascular disease ; currently use prescription medication ; history smoking ; drink excessively ( i.e. , 12 drink per week ) ; recent history creatine supplementation within six week start supplementation ;
